Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

TrackMagneticTransitionCheck.cxx
1 #include "KSReadFileROOT.h"
2 #include "TGraph.h"
3 #include "TApplication.h"
4 #include "TCanvas.h"
5 #include <KConst.h>
6 #include <vector>
7 #include <cmath>
8 #include <unordered_map>
9 #include <algorithm>
10 
11 using namespace Kassiopeia;
12 using namespace std;
13 
14 int main()
15 {
16 
17  double gyromagnetic_ratio = -1.83247172e+8;
18  //double spin_magnitude = 0.5; // in units of hbar
19 
20  KRootFile* tRootFile = new KRootFile();
21  tRootFile->AddToNames( "~/Work/kasper/install/output/Kassiopeia/CombinedNeutronTrapAdiabaticSimulation.root" );
22 
23  KSReadFileROOT tReader;
24  tReader.OpenFile(tRootFile );
25 
26  KSReadRunROOT& tRunReader = tReader.GetRun();
27  KSReadEventROOT& tEventReader = tReader.GetEvent();
28  KSReadTrackROOT& tTrackReader = tReader.GetTrack();
29  KSReadStepROOT& tStepReader= tReader.GetStep();
30 
31  KSReadObjectROOT& tCell = tStepReader.GetObject( "component_step_world" );
32  KSDouble& tTime = tCell.Get< KSDouble >( "time" );
33  //KSThreeVector& B = tCell.Get< KSThreeVector >( "magnetic_field" );
34  KSDouble& m = tCell.Get< KSDouble >( "aligned_spin" );
35 
36  vector<Double_t> time_list;
37  vector<KThreeVector> B_list;
38 
39  int cell_count = 0;
40  double Bxx_correlation_total = 0., Byy_correlation_total = 0., Bzz_correlation_total = 0., Bxz_correlation_total = 0.;
41  double Bxx_correlation, Byy_correlation, Bzz_correlation, Bxz_correlation;
42 
43  double theta = 0;
44  double frequency_gap = 0.;
45 
46  tRunReader = 0;
47  tEventReader = tRunReader.GetFirstEventIndex();
48  tTrackReader = tEventReader.GetFirstTrackIndex();
49  tStepReader = tTrackReader.GetFirstStepIndex();
50  if( tCell.Valid() )
51  {
52  double initial_m = m.Value();
53  theta = acos( initial_m );
54  frequency_gap = 1.e10;//std::fabs( 2. * initial_m * gyromagnetic_ratio * spin_magnitude );
55  }
56  else
57  {
58  std::cout << "FIRST CELL BROKEN";
59  exit(0);
60  }
61 
62  for( ; tRunReader <= tRunReader.GetLastRunIndex(); tRunReader++ )
63  {
64  for( ; tEventReader <= tRunReader.GetLastEventIndex(); tEventReader++ )
65  {
66  for( ; tTrackReader <= tEventReader.GetLastTrackIndex(); tTrackReader++ )
67  {
68  for( ; tStepReader <= tTrackReader.GetLastStepIndex(); tStepReader++ )
69  {
70  if( tCell.Valid() )
71  {
72  time_list.push_back( tTime.Value() );
73  //B_list.push_back( B.Value() );
74  B_list.push_back( KThreeVector( 1., std::cos( frequency_gap * tTime.Value() ), std::sin( frequency_gap * tTime.Value() ) ) );
75  //B_list.push_back( KThreeVector( std::sin(1.e+8 * tTime.Value()), std::cos(0.99999e+8 * tTime.Value()), std::sin( 0.9999999e+8 * tTime.Value() ) ) );
76  cell_count++;
77  }
78  }
79  }
80  }
81  }
82 
83  delete tRootFile;
84 
85  std::unordered_map< int, double > exponent_map;
86 
87  int average_length = 9999;
88 
89  double old_total = 0.;
90 
91  for (int i = average_length; i < cell_count-average_length; i++ )
92  {
93  for (int j = std::max(0, i-average_length); j < std::min(cell_count, i+average_length+1); j++ )
94  {
95  double exponent = exponent_map[ i-j ];
96  //std::cout << i << " " << j << " " << exponent << "\n";
97  if ( exponent == 0 )
98  {
99  //std::cout << "calculating " << i << " " << j << "\t" << time_list[i] - time_list[j] << "\t" << frequency_gap << " " << frequency_gap * ( time_list[i] - time_list[j] ) << " " << std::cos( frequency_gap * ( time_list[i] - time_list[j] ) ) << "\n";
100  exponent = std::cos( frequency_gap * ( time_list[i] - time_list[j] ) );
101  exponent_map[ i-j ] = exponent;
102  }
103  std::cout << exponent << "\t" << Bxx_correlation_total << "\t";
104  Bxx_correlation_total += B_list[i].X() * B_list[j].X() * exponent;
105  Byy_correlation_total += B_list[i].Y() * B_list[j].Y() * exponent;
106  Bzz_correlation_total += B_list[i].Z() * B_list[j].Z() * exponent;
107  Bxz_correlation_total += B_list[i].X() * B_list[j].Z() * exponent;
108  std::cout << Bxx_correlation_total << "\n";
109  }
110  std::cout << Bxx_correlation_total << "\t" << Bxx_correlation_total - old_total << "\n";
111  old_total = Bxx_correlation_total;
112  }
113 
114  Bxx_correlation = Bxx_correlation_total / ( 2 * average_length + 1 ) * ( time_list[1] - time_list[0] );
115  Byy_correlation = Byy_correlation_total / ( 2 * average_length + 1 ) * ( time_list[1] - time_list[0] );
116  Bzz_correlation = Bzz_correlation_total / ( 2 * average_length + 1 ) * ( time_list[1] - time_list[0] );
117  Bxz_correlation = Bxz_correlation_total / ( 2 * average_length + 1 ) * ( time_list[1] - time_list[0] );
118 
119  double TransitionRate = 1. / 16. * gyromagnetic_ratio * gyromagnetic_ratio * ( std::cos( theta ) * std::cos( theta ) * Bxx_correlation + Byy_correlation
120  + std::sin( theta ) * std::sin( theta ) * Bzz_correlation - 2 * std::cos( theta ) * std::sin( theta ) * Bxz_correlation );
121 
122  std::cout << "Resonant frequency: " << frequency_gap << "\n";
123  std::cout << "Total correlations: " << Bxx_correlation_total << " " << Byy_correlation_total << " " << Bzz_correlation_total << " " << Bxz_correlation_total << "\n";
124  std::cout << " averaging over: " << ( 2 * average_length + 1 ) << "\n";
125  std::cout << " at an angle of: " << theta << "\n";
126  std::cout << " with time step: " << time_list[1] - time_list[0] << "\n";
127  std::cout << "Transition Rate : " << TransitionRate << "\n";
128 
129  return 0;
130 }
